sourcesContent:
import React, {useEffect, useState, useRef} from 'react' import '../styles/tour-details.css'; import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup} from 'reactstrap'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating'; import avatar from '../assets/images/avatar.jpg'; import Booking from '../components/Booking/Booking'; import { BASE_URL } from '../utils/config'; import useFetch from '../hooks/useFetch'; const TourDetails = () => { const {id} = useParams() const{data:tour} = useFetch(`${BASE_URL}/tours/${id}`) const{photo, title, desc, price, reviews, address, city, distance, maxGroupSize}=tour; const {totalRating, avgRating} = calculateAvgRating(reviews) const options = {day:"numeric", month:"long", year:"numeric"} useEffect(()=>{ window.scrollTo(0, 0) }, []) return (
{ !loading && !error &&

{title}

{calculateAvgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? 'Not Rated' : ({reviews?.length})} {address}
{city} ${price}/per person {distance} k/m {maxGroupSize}
Description

{desc}

{/* tour reviews */} {/*

Reviews({reviews?.length} reviews)

1 2 3 4 5
{reviews?.map(review =>(
Tanishq

{new Date('01-18-2023').toLocaleDateString("en-US", options)}

5
))}
*/}
}
) } export default TourDetails
